This is a core course for a Minor in Education, Interpersonal Development and the Diploma in Education - Guidance Studies through the Faculty of Education.
This is an elective course for the Certificate in Health and Wellness.
Registration is restricted to students in the Faculty of Education for the first three weeks of registration.
Wait lists are not offered.
**Final closed book, paper exam will be written on the UBC-V campus.
